attributes.action: Reverse the legislation of the previous labour administration
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Tony Blair's government was responsible for unprecedented dark ages in history of this country. Whilst some needed changes were introduced, considerably more harm was done.
The new era of spin, misleading information, draconican civil liberties policies, mass uncontrolled immigration.
We the people of the UK call for the new PM to look in depth at the harm done to the very fabric and essence of our country, and call for him to abolish many of these changes that have been allowed to happen.
The government exists by the people and for the benefit of the people, and no-one else.
